title: New free champion rotation: Draven, Draven, and Draven!

replies.body: The real april fools joke is that URF still isn't here. Feelsbadman{{champion:119}}

IKR? Been waiting for 365 days and still waiting...{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}
I just need U.R.F.

urf isn't by a joke anymore.  this is april fools. they want to troll us and do silly pranks.  why does everyone want to force them to just roll out the same thing every time.  I don't mind having it come more often throughout the year.
The thing is we shouldn't have to wait a year for the most wanted gamemode to come back again. {{champion:119}}
Ascension says hi.
This guy/girl understands. I can't wait for Ascension to finally return; super excited.

The real joke is expecting not-Draven...{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}

Pretty good free rotation this week, but I am not quite sure what champion I should try first. They are all so . . . diverse. I mean, think about it: 

I think I might do {{champion:119}} , but {{champion:119}} seems a lot better. Even though {{champion:119}} is better than {{champion:119}} , {{champion:119}} and {{champion:119}}  just pack a huge punch. Moving on, {{champion:119}}  and {{champion:119}} AND {{champion:119}}  have such AMAZING kits and all on a single free rotation? Insane. Plus with {{champion:119}} and also {{champion:119}} ? Down right ridiculous. Finally for the last champion in the free rotation, {{champion:119}} , is also very good. Rito, you have done it again. 

Oh and lastly, I might be acting a bit picky, but I think if {{champion:119}} was included, this rotation would be much better. But still pretty close.
Hands down, you cracked me up lol.
Thanks! I try my best :3

I disagree about {{champion:119}}, {{champion:119}} and {{champion:119}} . I think their kits are a little lackluster. Which is why I will not be using them on this rotation. However, I do agree about {{champion:119}} . I can't wait to try him out. I also am pumped about the inclusion of {{champion:119}} and {{champion:119}} . Probably 2 of my favorite champions. All and all a great rotation.
I agree with your first point I guess. They could have added {{champion:119}} , {{champion:119}} , and {{champion:119}} instead. They have much better kits.
Not Draven; Draaaven.{{champion:119}}
